version_description:
-UnlimTones has been completely redesigned from the ground up
-You can now create tones from files you download on the web.
-You can now create tones from voice recordings
-Please leave us a review if you like the app and the new update

-UnlimTones has been completely redesigned from the ground up
-You can now create tones from files you download on the web.
-You can now create tones from voice recordings
-Please leave us a review if you like the app and the new update

FIXES
*Fixed a bug which causes the app to crash when users click on an ad
*Fixed bug which causes a crash when fade in/out is enabled on a really short tone

FIXES
*Fixed a bug which causes the app to crash when users click on an ad
*Fixed bug which causes a crash when fade in/out is enabled on a really short tone
